navbar.featureTagline: Everything you need for the perfect resume

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Get in touch with our team

homepageText.text1: Stand Out from the Crowd with Our Online Resume Builder
homepageText.text2: Our resume builder is the perfect tool to help you create a professional, polished resume in just a few minutes. With our intuitive design and simple step-by-step process, you can easily build a resume that stands out from the competition. Whether you're a recent graduate or a seasoned professional, our web application has everything you need to take your career to the next level
homepageText.text6: Select what do you want to create.
homepageText.text8: Empower Your Resume with Our Advanced Features
homepageText.text9: Our resume builder offers a variety of features to help users create a professional and effective resume. These include pre-written phrase suggestions, shareable link, PDF export, customizable templates, auto-save, spell check, track changes, collaboration, and personal branding resources. All these features make creating a professional resume easy and efficient.

typingEffect.sentence1: Welcome To Placment Eco System GTR Academy
typingEffect.sentence5: Ace interviews with GTR Academy prep tools

HomepageHero.description: Create stunning, ATS-friendly resumes and cover letters with GTR Academy assistance. Choose from professional templates, get real-time feedback, and land your dream job faster.

HomepageTrustedBy.title: Seamlessly Works With Industry Tools
HomepageTrustedBy.description: Our GTR powered resume builder integrates with popular platforms and tools used by professionals worldwide.

HomepageSteps.description: Join thousands of professionals who've accelerated their careers with our GTR-powered resume builder. Get noticed, land interviews, and secure your dream job faster than ever before.

benefits.title: Land More Job Interviews
benefits.description: Our ATS-optimized templates and AI-powered content suggestions help your resume get past automated screening systems and into the hands of hiring managers.
benefits.detail: Join thousands of professionals who've increased their interview rate by 3x using our proven system.

benefits.title: Stand Out From The Competition
benefits.description: With professional designs and compelling content recommendations, showcase your unique value proposition and get noticed faster by recruiters.
benefits.detail: Our smart formatting and keyword optimization ensure your resume catches attention in seconds.

benefits.title: Build Confidence In Your Job Search
benefits.description: Present your best professional self with a polished, error-free resume that reflects your true potential and professional accomplishments.
benefits.detail: Feel confident knowing your application materials are professionally crafted and industry-compliant.

cta.title: Ready to Land Your Dream Job?

configurationScreen.title: Configure Your Interview
configurationScreen.subtitle: Customize your interview experience by providing your occupation and preferences
configurationScreen.occupationPlaceholder: E.g., Software Engineer, Teacher, Nurse, Farmer, Chef...
configurationScreen.occupationHint: Be specific about your role for more tailored questions
configurationScreen.tryAgainError: Please try again or try a different occupation.
configurationScreen.generatingHint: This may take a few seconds. We're crafting questions specific to your occupation.

selectionScreen.title: Interview Assessment
selectionScreen.subtitle: Choose your assessment type and complete the interview process
selectionScreen.technicalDescription: Evaluate technical skills, programming languages, frameworks, methodologies, and problem-solving abilities specific to your role.
selectionScreen.behavioralDescription: Assess leadership qualities, communication skills, teamwork abilities, and how you handle workplace situations.
selectionScreen.guideline1: ‚Ä¢ Read each question carefully before answering
selectionScreen.guideline2: ‚Ä¢ Use the flag feature to mark questions for review
selectionScreen.guideline4: ‚Ä¢ Take advantage of the pause feature if needed
selectionScreen.configurationHint: Configure your occupation and interview preferences

interviewScreen.pauseMessage: Click Resume to continue your assessment

confirmationModal.title: Finish Assessment?
confirmationModal.message: Are you sure you want to submit your assessment? You won't be able to change your answers.

HeadingStep.title: Personal & Contact Information
HeadingStep.subtitle: Tell us about yourself so employers can reach you easily. All required fields must be completed to proceed.

jobTitle.label: Job Title / Profession
jobTitle.placeholder: e.g., Software Engineer, Marketing Manager, Data Analyst
jobTitle.hint: This will be prominently displayed on your resume

address.label: Address
address.hint: Full address is optional, city and country are usually sufficient

contactInfo.title: Contact Information Tips
contactInfo.description: Use a professional email address and ensure your phone number is current. This is how employers will reach you.

locationInfo.title: Location Information
locationInfo.description: Adding location helps employers understand your availability for local positions and remote work preferences.

completion.title: Section Complete!
completion.description: Great! All required information has been provided. You can now proceed to the next section or continue adding optional details.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

WorkHistoryStep.title: Tell us about your work experience
WorkHistoryStep.subtitle: Start with your most recent position and work backwards. Include your last 10 years of relevant experience.

description.label: Job Description
description.placeholder: Describe your key responsibilities and achievements in detail. What impact did you make? What skills did you use?

ai.tooltipDisabled: Fill in Job Title and Company first

EducationStep.title: Tell us about your education

description.label: Education Description
description.placeholder: Relevant coursework, achievements, honors, GPA, research projects, thesis work, etc...

ai.tooltipDisabled: Fill in School and Degree first

SkillsStep.title: What skills would you like to highlight?
SkillsStep.subtitle: Choose skills that are most relevant to the job you're applying for. Include both technical and soft skills.
SkillsStep.requiredNote: * Add at least 3 skills for best results

quickAdd.title: Quick Add Skills
quickAdd.subtitle: Click to add popular skills instantly

content.label: Summary Content
content.placeholder: Write a compelling summary that showcases your professional background, key skills, and career objectives. Highlight your unique value proposition and what makes you stand out...

JobsLandingHero.description: Discover thousands of job opportunities from top companies. Whether you're looking for remote work, career advancement, or your first job, we connect talented professionals with their perfect match.

LandingJobTopCompanies.title: Join Leading Companies
LandingJobTopCompanies.description: Discover opportunities at world-class companies that are actively hiring. From startups to Fortune 500, find your perfect match.

LandingJobsProcess.title: Land Your Dream Job in
LandingJobsProcess.description: Our streamlined process makes job searching effortless. From discovery to hiring, we guide you every step of the way to ensure you find the perfect opportunity.
LandingJobsProcess.featuresDescription: We provide cutting-edge tools and features to make your job search more effective and efficient.

0.title: Search & Discover
0.description: Browse thousands of job opportunities from top companies. Use our advanced filters to find the perfect match for your skills and preferences.

1.title: Create Profile
1.description: Build your professional profile with our resume builder. Showcase your skills, experience, and achievements to stand out from the crowd.

2.title: Apply Instantly
2.description: Apply to multiple jobs with one click. Our smart application system automatically tailors your profile to each position.

3.title: Get Hired
3.description: Connect with hiring managers, schedule interviews, and land your dream job. We support you throughout the entire process.

0.title: GTR Academy-Powered Matching
0.description: Our intelligent algorithm matches you with relevant opportunities

1.description: Automatically optimize your resume for each application

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals who have found their dream jobs through our platform. Your next opportunity is just a click away.
